text: 'Joker just keeps cracking up. Audience still isn't sure what to make of him. There's some awkward laughter.'
Murray glances over at his producer Gene Ufland, who's sitting off-camera on a director's chair by a monitor. Gene shrugs at him.
The associate producer tries not to laugh, but she can't help it. The director looks over at her like she's lost her mind.
